hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Bombs (20 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Dampé's Hut#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: J = 0;&while J < 10;&   Press ;&   J++;^   Press ;&   J++;^   Press ;&   J++;^   Press ;&   J++;^   Press ;&   J++;^   Press ;&   J++;^   Press ;&   J++;^   Press ;&   J++;^   Press ;&   J++;^   Press ;^break;

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Minuet of Forest#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Third Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: Ganondorf brushes his rotten teeth with salted slug flavoured tooth paste!

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Bombchus (5 pieces)# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.
